name: LivingEntityHelper
description: Represents a living entity in the world such as mobs, players, and animals. LivingEntityHelper provides access to health, status effects, equipment, and other properties specific to living entities.
overview: Instances are typically obtained from entity events, player methods, or by accessing nearby entities. This class extends `EntityHelper` and inherits all methods for position, movement, and general entity properties.

methods.name: getStatusEffects
methods.description: Gets a list of active status effects currently applied to the living entity.

methods.name: canHaveStatusEffect
methods.description: Checks if the living entity can have the given status effect applied.

methods.name: hasStatusEffect
methods.description: Checks if the living entity has a status effect with the specified ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the status effect to check (e.g., 'minecraft:regeneration').

methods.name: isHolding
methods.description: Checks if the living entity is holding the specified item in either hand.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item stack to check for.

methods.name: getMainHand
methods.description: Gets the item stack held in the main hand of the living entity.

methods.name: getOffHand
methods.description: Gets the item stack held in the off-hand of the living entity.

methods.name: getHeadArmor
methods.description: Gets the item stack equipped in the head armor slot.

methods.name: getChestArmor
methods.description: Gets the item stack equipped in the chest armor slot.

methods.name: getLegArmor
methods.description: Gets the item stack equipped in the legs armor slot.

methods.name: getFootArmor
methods.description: Gets the item stack equipped in the feet armor slot.

methods.name: getHealth
methods.description: Gets the current health value of the living entity.

methods.name: getMaxHealth
methods.description: Gets the maximum health value of the living entity.

methods.name: getAbsorptionHealth
methods.description: Gets the current absorption health value of the living entity.

methods.name: getArmor
methods.description: Gets the total armor points of the living entity from equipped armor.

methods.name: getDefaultHealth
methods.description: Gets the default health value for this type of living entity.

methods.name: getMobTags
methods.description: Gets a list of data tags associated with the mob, such as 'minecraft:undead'.

methods.name: isSleeping
methods.description: Checks if the living entity is currently sleeping.

methods.name: isFallFlying
methods.description: Checks if the living entity is currently fall flying (e.g., with an elytra).

methods.name: isOnGround
methods.description: Checks if the living entity is currently on the ground.

methods.name: canBreatheInWater
methods.description: Checks if the living entity can breathe underwater.

methods.name: hasNoDrag
methods.description: Checks if the living entity has no drag applied (e.g., Spectators).

methods.name: hasNoGravity
methods.description: Checks if the living entity is unaffected by gravity.

methods.name: canTarget
methods.description: Checks if this living entity can target another specified living entity.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The target entity to check against.

methods.name: canTakeDamage
methods.description: Checks if the living entity can currently take damage.

methods.name: isPartOfGame
methods.description: Checks if the living entity is part of the game world (not a spectator or debug entity).

methods.name: isSpectator
methods.description: Checks if the living entity is currently in spectator mode.

methods.name: isUndead
methods.description: Checks if the living entity is of the undead type (e.g., Zombie, Skeleton).

methods.name: getBowPullProgress
methods.description: Gets the progress of bow pulling (0.0 to 1.0) if an item with bow mechanics is being used.

methods.name: getItemUseTimeLeft
methods.description: Gets the remaining use time for the item currently being used.

methods.name: isBaby
methods.description: Checks if the living entity is a baby or juvenile.

methods.name: canSeeEntity
methods.description: Checks if the living entity has a direct line of sight to another entity.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The entity to check visibility against.

methods.name: canSeeEntity
methods.description: Checks if the living entity has a direct line of sight to another entity, with an option for simplified raycasting.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The entity to check visibility against.

parameters.name: simpleCast
parameters.description: If true, uses a simplified raycast for performance.
